title: EYL #177 How Antoine Dixon Bellot Built a Media & Real Estate Empire in The U.K.
itunes:title: EYL #177 How Antoine Dixon Bellot Built a Media & Real Estate Empire in The U.K.
description:
Antoine Dixon Bellot is one of the top TV and film production entrepreneurs in the U.K. He’s known as “The Tyler Perry of England”. The comparison is fitting since he owns every area of his media empire, from manufacturing camera lenses to owning a 52 acre estate that he’s turning into a studio lot. 


Aside from being a media mogul, he also owns over £15,000,000 in residential real estate. In episode 177, Antoine went over his amazing journey with us and gave the blueprint for his success. #London #uk #AntoineDixonBellot 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/antoinedixonbellot?utm_medium=copy_link


For the latest in EYL Merch: https://www.earnyourleisure.com/collections/all

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
